title: Stately Apartment for Rent
description:
Available NOW: 5111 Wayne Avenue, #3. An immaculate 3 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment featuring a bright interior with hardwood floors throughout. The house itself is cozy and charming with hardwood floors throughout, radiator heating, and plenty of natural light pouring in.
Enter your new apartment through the spacious common area with gorgeous tiles at the front. You'll have space for different living room and dining room furniture set ups, and there is additional counter space and storage off the kitchen, which would serve well for entertaining guests. The kitchen is towards the back of the common area and is equipped with polished countertops, ample cabinetry, and appliances. Continue to your 2 bedrooms, the smaller one with good closet space and the larger one offering big bright windows and a closet with twin doors. Head into your bathroom boasting a window, vanity, travertine tiles, stall shower and additional storage. Other notable features include a covered front porch and street parking in the front. Don't miss this opportunity to live in this great location in a fabulous apartment!
About The Neighborhood: The location is as convenient as it gets with the Wayne Junction train station, and the local shops and restaurants of Germantown Avenue all a short walk away. The house is situated between the 23, 53, H, and K bus routes and the Chestnut Hill West Regional Rail line, which all lead directly into the adjacent neighborhoods and Center City.
The neighborhood is friendly, and full of welcoming cafes and community spaces. Within walking distance, you will find Deke’s Barbecue, which is in an old factory across from the Wayne Junction train station, and Merzbacher’s Bakery, which makes over twenty varieties of hand-crafted breads and rolls monthly art shows and seasonal community events. A quick trip on the 23 bus will bring you to Uncle Bobbies Books and Coffee Shop in Germantown and to the historic Germantown house museums.
Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make a minimum of 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, no landlord filings, or evictions within the past four (4) years and must have a verifiable rental history. No smoking. First and last month's rent due at signing.
Reach out today to schedule a showing!

title: 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom bi-level apartment is centrally located just of
description:
Available NOW: Welcome to 532 S 15th Street, #1! This 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom bi-level apartment is centrally located just of of South Street, walking distance to Center City and Rittenhouse Square. Enter on main level into the spacious living, dining, and kitchen area with lovely bay window in the front. Your modern kitchen boasts beautiful white cabinetry, ample prep space, and sleek stainless steel appliances including electric stove + oven, dishwasher, and fridge. There's a large closet for storage by the kitchen area. Continue back to your 1st bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom features a vanity, window, and separate shower with glass door. Your bedroom is sizable and bright, with a gorgeous accent wall, ceiling fan for year-round comfort, and large closet. There's a door that leads to your outside space - perfect for the warmer months! Head down the lower level to view your other bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom offers stunning floor-to-ceiling tiling, a lighted vanity, cabinet over the toilet, and a full size shower / tub combo. The 2nd bedroom features plush wall-to-wall carpeting, a ceiling fan, and good closet space. There's an additional storage area to the back, plus in-unit laundry and central a/c for added convenience. Schedule your showing today! description:
No. 710: Sun-soaked one bedroom filled with charm available at the Historic Touraine Building. The open floorplan also boasts a large closet outfitted with a custom closet kit, and crown molding in the living space. The Touraine: Formerly an elegant residential hotel built in 1917, The Touraine combines original architectural details with modern comforts. The Touraine is Philadelphia's most central and beautiful address. Located on a tree-lined block of Spruce Street, the Touraine is just a quick walk to Rittenhouse Square, the Avenue of the Arts, and all the transportation and shopping of Center City. Ours is a thriving community of locally owned businesses from craft beer to great coffee, bike repair to bagels, and countless beloved BYOB's where you can dine outside. title: Unique Townhomes Offer an Exciting Opportunity to Enjoy Luxury Living!
description:
Introducing SoNo26, a premier living destination in Philadelphia?s Northern Liberties. Our unique townhomes offer an exciting opportunity to enjoy luxury living while being in the center of all the city has to offer. Stroll and shop along Liberty Walk or enjoy a gourmet meal at one of the critically acclaimed restaurants, bars and cafes. The homes at SoNo26 feature all of the high quality finishes you?ve come to expect from a Premier Access property. Step inside your front door and you will be greeted with a spacious open concept living and dining area with beautifully designed windows that offer magnificent natural sunlight. The living area flows nicely into the top of the line gourmet kitchen which features Arctic Quartz countertops, Bosch appliances and custom cabinets making this kitchen the perfect space to entertain friends. Open the sliding glass doors and you will find your back patio where you can enjoy your morning cup of coffee or glass of wine after dinner. Leading off of the kitchen are stairs to take you down to your full finished basement with washer and dryer and half bath giving you a great added space for guests or an entertainment center. Head back up the stairs and continue to the second floor where you will find two spacious bedrooms with large closets and plenty of storage as well as two bathrooms for your convenience. On the upper floor you will enter into the large master suite with incredible walk in closets and master bath with double sinks that will make you feel right at home. On the top floor you will find your unbelievable roof deck that offers spectacular views of the Philadelphia skyline making this a relaxing at home retreat. To add on to all that SoNo26 has to offer, each unit comes with 1 car parking to ensure you never have a problem finding a space for your car. These brand new units will not last long set up your showing today and come home to SoNo26!

description:

Freshly painted. The entire home is hardwood floored, along with a contemporary kitchen with granite countertops and new equipment, a fireplace, a ceiling fan in the family room, double windows in the living room and kitchen, and a lot of windows letting in natural light. The view of the common area is excellent from the family room/kitchen area. On the second floor, two closets, a full bathroom with ceramic tile flooring, a shower/tub combo, and a whirlpool tub are all features of the primary bedroom. There are also two additional bedrooms and a second full bathroom. A sizable linen closet and a separate laundry room with brand-new washer and dryer machines are also located on this floor. The finished basement offers more living space with hardwood flooring, and there is also a separate, big storage facility in another area. The entire house has brand-new, cordless, safer window coverings! Only a short drive away from all the dining, shopping, and entertainment choices Phoenixville has to offer!Phoenixville: A city consistently on the rise, Phoenixville is the ideal suburb for families and renters interested in a tight-knit community. As a suburb of Philadelphia, Phoenixville offers easy access into the city, with Downtown located just 30 or so miles southeast of town by Highway 422 and Highway 76. A major perk of Phoenixville is its proximity to the Valley Forge National Historic Park, a national treasure and Revolutionary War site.Phoenixville houses Reeves Park, Reservoir Park, and the Black Rock Sanctuary. This city sits along the Schuylkill River and is known for its historic roots that are maintained by the Historic Society of the Phoenixville Area. Families adore this suburb for its top-notch public schools like Phoenixville Area High School and the locals’ community spirit. Downtown features various attractions and small businesses along Bridge Street and Main Street.Rooms and Interior. Finished basementLease Terms. Dogs ok up to 25 lbs. description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

description:
Enjoy modern elegance & contemporary loft living in the heart of Bella Vista offering 1,860 square feet of living space, 20’ ceilings, a deeded roof top deck and 2-car parking. New York City style loft with tall energy efficient windows showcasing beautiful sunsets and breathtaking views of Philadelphia. The luxurious Lofts of Bella Vista is an early 20th Century Industrial pet friendly building. This penthouse unit is one of only 2 penthouse units that include a rooftop deck. This 2 bedroom, 2 bath penthouse unit offers a mirrored floor plan with the bedrooms situated on opposite sides of an open concept kitchen/living layout. Both bedrooms provide substantial morning light, and ample closet/storage options. The kitchen and living space allow for seamless entertaining with exposed bricks & polished concrete floors throughout. Entry provides large coat closet and hall laundry room/pantry. Kitchen by Schiffini with marble countertops and waterfall marble kitchen island. Bathrooms with soaking tubs and vanities by Rifra with Zucchetti fixtures. This unit has custom design features by interior designer Michelle Gage (showcased in design blogs & multiple publications). You will experience the European flair of this completely rehabbed warehouse, which was once inhabited by Curtis Publishing Company. Enjoy 2-car heated garage parking (via parking lift), 24-hour security with front desk concierge, fitness room, a community media/meeting room with prep kitchen, secured storage unit (monthly fee), and bike storage room. Conveniently located within walking distance to the Italian Market, Avenue of the Arts, Passyunk Square and some of Philadelphia’s top restaurants, boutique shopping, a variety of name brand commercial stores, public transportation and more. title: Spacious living with beautiful views of the Philly Skyline
description:
Available: 11/30/22
Balmoral floor plan — 1,136 sq. ft. — $3,125 – 3,175
This brand-new construction Balmoral boasts 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, on either side of the apartment. It has a spacious living room that can fit ample furniture and a dining set. The master suite comes with a large walk-in closet and double sinks with a luminous shower. The guest bedroom is roomy as well and the bath offers a roomy garden tub/shower combo! It also features a beautiful balcony that starts in the living room and extends into the master bedroom. This gorgeous apartment is within close proximity to our clubhouse –featuring a 24-hour fitness center, theatre room, resort-style swimming pool, and much more!
Our leasing office is open 7 days a week – call  show contact info
to schedule a tour today!
